name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar OGELSBY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar OGELSBY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of February, 2015, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Although counsel was negligent, Petitioner is entitled to a counsel-filed Petition for Allowance of Appeal. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122. Counsel is DIRECTED to file the already-prepared Petition for Allowance within 5 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
109 A.3d 676
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lamar OGELSBY, Petitioner.
No. 4 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 11, 2015.
